message.content:
We first identify the required items and then compute them using data from the provided statements.

1. Free Cash Flow (FCF)
 • Using the definition: FCF = Operating Cash Flow – Capital Expenditure.
 • From the cash flow statement:
  – Operating Cash Flow = –4,398,760.38 
  – Purchase of Fixed Assets (Capital Expenditure) = 324,677.57
 • Thus, FCF = –4,398,760.38 – 324,677.57 = –4,723,437.95

2. Return on Assets (ROA)
 • Formula: ROA = (Net Profit ÷ Average Total Assets) × 100%
 • Total Assets from the balance sheet:
  – Beginning Total Assets = 13,000,000.00
  – Ending Total Assets = 14,089,860.66
 • Average Total Assets = (13,000,000.00 + 14,089,860.66) ÷ 2 = 13,544,930.33
 • Net Profit from the income statement = –1,401,436.89 
 • Then ROA = (–1,401,436.89 ÷ 13,544,930.33) × 100% ≈ –10.35%

3. Return on Equity (ROE)
 • Formula: ROE = (Net Profit ÷ Average Owner’s Equity) × 100%
 • Owner’s Equity:
  – Beginning Owner’s Equity = 13,000,000.00
  – Ending Owner’s Equity = 11,598,563.11
 • Average Owner’s Equity = (13,000,000.00 + 11,598,563.11) ÷ 2 = 12,299,281.56
 • ROE = (–1,401,436.89 ÷ 12,299,281.56) × 100% ≈ –11.39%

4. Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio
 • Formula: Ratio = Operating Cash Flow ÷ Net Profit
 • Using values: –4,398,760.38 ÷ (–1,401,436.89) ≈ 3.14
 • (The negatives cancel out.)

5. Net Profit Margin
 • Formula: Net Profit Margin = (Net Profit ÷ Total Revenue) × 100%
 • From the income statement:
  – Total Revenue = 7,825,951.24
  – Net Profit = –1,401,436.89
 • Net Profit Margin = (–1,401,436.89 ÷ 7,825,951.24) × 100% ≈ –17.91%

6. Gross Profit Margin
 • Formula: Gross Profit Margin = (Gross Profit ÷ Total Revenue) × 100%
 • From the income statement:
  – Gross Profit = 1,535,951.24
  – Total Revenue = 7,825,951.24
 • Gross Profit Margin = (1,535,951.24 ÷ 7,825,951.24) × 100% ≈ 19.63%

Now we place the results in the final answer JSON.

{
  "solution": {
    "Free Cash Flow (FCF)": "-4723437.95",
    "Return on Assets (ROA)": "-10.35%",
    "Return on Equity (ROE)": "-11.39%",
    "Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio": "3.14",
    "Net Profit Margin": "-17.91%",
    "Gross Profit Margin": "19.63%"
  }
}
